revised_title: Numerical Solutions of Differential Equations for Reflexion of Long Radio Waves from the Ionosphere
tldr: The authors present two numerical methods for solving differential equations that govern the reflexion of long and very long radio waves from the ionosphere. They describe the mathematical and physical basis of these methods and discuss their application using the EDSAC digital calculating machine. The methods provide a way to calculate the reflecting properties of the ionosphere for long radio waves, helping to understand the properties of the ionosphere and its electron density.
